mapper.select: select rownum as wish_no,guide_subject,user_nick,text_regdate,text_total_person,reservation_person from wish,text,guide,users,reservation where guide.guide_no=reservation.guide_no and text.text_no=guide.text_no and wish.guide_no=guide.guide_no

select rownum as wish_no,tour_theme,user_nick,text_regdate,text_total_person,reservation_person from wish,text,tour,users,reservation where tour.tour_no=reservation.tour_no and text.text_no=tour.text_no and wish.tour_no=tour.tour_no
